The story of PIECES OF A DREAM is a tale of destiny and brotherhood. Picture ... James Lloyd and Curtis Harmon have been the nucleus of Pieces of a Dream ...
Comprised of bassist Cedric Napoleon, drummer Curtis Harmon, and keyboardist James Lloyd, Pieces of a Dream were founded in 1975 in Philadelphia.
